content.html: And quite frankly recently there's a lot of things that have made me question @dhh competency more than usual, with just constant bad takes. I mean Rework was essentially large print guff, not as clever as it thinks it is. PopSci thought leadership.
content.value:
And quite frankly recently there's a lot of things that have made me question @dhh competency more than usual, with just constant bad takes.

I mean Rework was essentially large print guff, not as clever as it thinks it is. PopSci thought leadership.
